samples.context: Given the following dataset about EasternCT course times, we know if a class is labeled as online then it has no physical room.

qa_pairs.question: Look at BIS 205 and determine if the class is online?

samples.context: Given the following dataset about EasternCT faculty office hours, we know that a professor is available to meet if they have office hours.

qa_pairs.question: Given it is 8:15am on monday, determine if Dr. Dancik is available to meet?

samples.context: Given the following dataset about EasternCT faculty contact info, we know that if we email a professor at their email they will get back to us.

qa_pairs.question: Given the email aaidoo@easternct.edu will Anthony aidoo email us back?

samples.context: Looking at the following dataset below about EasternCT course times, we know if a class is listed to take place on 'M' it will take place on monday.

qa_pairs.question: Looking at HON 361 sec 1, determine if the class will take place on monday.

samples.context: Looking at the following dataset below about EasternCT faculty office hours, we know that a professor is available to meet if they have office hours.

qa_pairs.question: Given it is 9:00pm on friday, determine if Dr. Connolly is avaiable to meet?
